programlisting: # Gets data about a role. # # @param name [String] The name of the role to look up. # @return [Aws::IAM::Role] The retrieved role. def get_role(name) role = @iam_resource.role(name) puts("Got data for role '#{role.name}'. Its ARN is '#{role.arn}'.") rescue Aws::Errors::ServiceError => e puts("Couldn't get data for role '#{name}' Here's why:") puts("\t#{e.code}: #{e.message}") raise else role end
